description:
The course will expose students to a field of inquiry within anthropology that
is close to the heart of the professional work of their professor. It will fulfil
one of the advanced seminar requirements within the anthropology major of
which students are required to take two. In Semester 1 of AY2016/2017, the
topic will be on Anthropology of Human Rights.
title: Adv Topic in Anthropology: Anthropology of Human Rights
prerequisite: YCC2121 Modern Social Thought or permission of the instructor
corequisite: YCC2121 Modern Social Thought or permission of the instructor
